title: Desert Dreams
description: Originally featured in the anthology Fantasies of a Housewife edited by Tina Pollick, "Desert Dreams" is a contemporary romantic short story. Shaylene Thomas is a busy working mom. Raising her two girls on her own in rural Arizona's high desert country, each day is an adventure filled with both beauty and challenges-- and she wouldn't trade a moment of it for all the riches in all the skyscrapers in the world. But sometimes she dreams of a warm pair of arms to curl into at night ... and sometimes dreams come true.Reviews of Sophia Jones' "Her writing is just so captivating and the worlds she creates is just so hypnotizing you'll never want to leave them to go back to your own reality." -- Goodreads Review"Great short story, in fact one of the best I've read. The story was straight to the point, thrilling ... If there was a follow up novella I wouldn't hesitate to download it as I would love to know what happens next ..."- Amazon UK Review"Sophia Jones is absolutely brilliant! The story was riveting, witty and surprisingly hilarious ... it has all the key elements to keep the reader on the edge of their mystery, thrill, romance, comical dialogue, and exotic location!"- A Booknatic
author: Sophia  Jones
